short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wordye can highlight selected words and add them to a word list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Familiarity-Based Tagging: Highlight words in red, yellow, or green based on how well you know them, giving you a clear way to manage vocabulary at various proficiency levels.
Instant Highlighting: Marked words will appear in the assigned color on web pages, helping you revisit these words repeatedly as you read and reinforce your memory.
Hover for Quick Definitions: If you still can’t recall a word’s meaning, simply hover your mouse over it to see a brief definition—perfect for deepening your impression and strengthening recall.
Whether you’re expanding your vocabulary or reviewing words you’ve already learned, Wordye offers a more efficient learning experience. Give Wordye a try and make your vocabulary-building journey easier and more enjoyable!
